page.title: 19NUNTHORPE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This school has nursery children aged 3. The school is well equipped with computers, calculators, television, video and library but we need new desks. We have a self-service dinner system. Favourite lessons are Art, Games Science and Educational outings. We have had Christmas Carol Concerts, Dramatic productions, Easter Bonnet and Egg Decorating Competitions, football matches and an Asian week. We made sweets to sell at our Summer Carnival which had games like tombola and wet sponge throwing, 'body-popping' display and pony rides. We also have Sports Day and a party for the J4 school leavers. Our groundsmen work at 8 schools in a week. They cut grass, mark tracks, weed and trim hedges. One is 1.98m tall. We call him the 'Jolly Green Giant'.
